extendedInfo.description: Time tracking is simple and easy with HoursTracker, the Android version of the best time tracker on iOS.  Keep track of your time and earnings at your hourly job, or track time as a contractor or freelancer.  Use it like a punch clock; start a timer with only two quick taps.  Or, record your time by entering your punch times manually.  View your earnings (even overtime!) and pay periods in the app, or export your time card via e-mail in text or CSV format and work with it however you need to.Other time tracking apps are slow, complex, and clunky.  HoursTracker is super responsive and features a modern and intuitive pure Android user interface with support for gestures such as swipe between tabs, and long-press actions.If you prefer to try before you buy, install our Free version.  You can upgrade via In-App Purchase anytime.  Google Play link: http://goo.gl/2mm78FEATURESâ Track your time while you use other apps (or even power off your phone!) without HoursTracker being active in the background.  No extra drain on your battery.â Add as many jobs as you need, thereâs no limit.â Track your time in real-time by clocking in/out while you work.  Watch as time and earnings accumulate by the minute.â Already working but forgot to clock in?  No problem, use âStart Clock At...â and start counting time from when you started work.â Be alerted when you've worked your expected daily hours. Just set the "time per day" for your jobs, then clock in/out like always. You'll also see a neat visual representation of how much work time is left in your day.  Even takes time rounding into account!â Enter time manually -- just choose a start date/time and an end date/time or just a duration.  Add comments, change the hourly rate for that entry to account for pay differentials, easily subtract breaks, and apply pre-defined tags to help categorize your entries.â View your time and earnings by day, or by calendar week or month on the Entries tab.â Choose between weekly, bi-weekly, semi-monthly, or monthly pay period styles for each job and view your time by pay period on the Pay Periods tab.  Enter an estimated tax percentage and per-pay period deductions and HoursTracker will even display net earnings estimates.â Assign a pay rate and HoursTracker will calculate your earnings, even taking overtime into account.â Track your daily and weekly overtime earnings with two rates for each.  If you get paid time and a half over 8 hours and double-time over 12 hours or by the week (or both!), HoursTracker has you covered.â Clock in to any number of jobs at a time, or set it up to have only one timer running at a time automatically.  Just clock in to another job and the current one automatically clocks out.â Flexible rounding options automatically round your time worked and can be configured per-job.  If you round up to 1/10th of an hour, or just want to match your time clock's 15 minute rounding, HoursTracker can do it automatically.â Export time sheet data via e-mail in text or CSV formats in the message body or attachment.  Export all jobs, or any selection of jobs, for all-time or between any two dates.  Combine all entries into one daily summary, or export each one including the clock in / out times.â Full edit and delete of jobs and hours worked.  Easily copy a job if a new job will have similar settings.â Date formats and currency symbols respect your deviceâs international settings.HoursTracker has been the top time tracking app on iOS for over three years and we've re-imagined it for Android.  We're just getting started on Android and have a lot of cool plans for the future.  If you love Hours Tracker please consider writing a review.  Join us at facebook.com/HoursTracker.  For support e-mail AndroidSupport@gmail.com.  Please write to us instead of submitting bugs or questions in a review.

reviews.title: Request
reviews.comment: Want ability to save to Google Drive instead of emailing the export to myself. Also would want breaks to reduce 1 hour versus split records while still keeping correct start and stop times.
reviews.author: Michael Perez

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: An excellent app!  I use it every work day to track my hours!
reviews.author: Daniel Gama

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: The app records when you punch in & out, based on the persons degree of accuracy entering the information. Yesterday, I forgot to punch out on the app. I saw my error & was able to go back & edit my mistake. My employer pays in 6-minute-increments. The app makes provisions for that. You can set it up for overtime after a specific numbers of hours each day. You can set it up for overtime after a 40-hour work week. The ONLY thing holding me back from a perfect 5-star rating...??? My employer offers shift differential & specific double-time. Either I haven\'t located how to enter the information..., OR..., it isn\'t there..., yet. Aside from that, the app is WELL worth the $4.99. My regards to the folks at cribasoft, LLC.
reviews.author: Rick Kline

reviews.comment: It is broken. When adding a break it changes the ending time and adds bogus record!\tMaybe good if fixed<,
reviews.author: Patrick Salas

reviews.title: Much better \342\230\206Thank you\342\230\206
reviews.comment: Thanks for the new meal period feature. Would it be possible have it appear as one entry.
reviews.author: Mark Rickards

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Aside from one issue with manual entry I love it.
reviews.author: Mona Baby

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Been waiting for this to come to android for 2+ years now! Great app and developer support is outstanding!
reviews.author: Justin Ingle

reviews.title: Best \"time clock\" out there!
reviews.comment: This has saved me hundreds of dollars. No more guessing how long I was on the job..
reviews.author: Gary Soucy

reviews.title: Awesome Application
reviews.comment: This is the best time card out. I\'ve been using this for years!! Plus you can email directly to your payroll department.
reviews.author: Anthony M. Dixon

reviews.title: The best app on iOS & now on Android too!
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app for 2 years on the my iPhone and was extremely disappointed when I didn\'t see it on google play. This app is excellent, simple to use, and perfect for my working schedule. I\'ll never have a pay check that will have missing hours ever again! Also, the developer is amazing. He reached out to me and let me know the app was available on the Android market place. Thanks Carlos!
reviews.author: Nitin Kumar

reviews.comment: Awesome app!!  So glad to finally see it on android!
reviews.author: marcelo assis

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Use this app to track my hours brilliant app
reviews.author: Tina Fernandes
